Darkfate/Perceptor/DragonFly/Blacknighmare::

"Good sugestion..." said sarcastically Darkfate to Megatron while he 
fired in robot mode against Megatron (5 shots withs his mega cannon, 
and 5 with his's sneak's heads)


Dragon FLy and Blacknighmare  started shot against Tankorr.

Perceptor used his com link and said "Sharpclaws, Deepfear, 
Underground, Charon... Leave the base ande come!!!"

Perceptor started to shot against MArine and the others



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Megatron cruises to the scene, behinde him are Marine, 
Pheniox, 
> Jackle, Gremlin, and Megaton. He see's the attack...and the 
Energonians.
>        "Ominous Prime? He's returned? This is a rather interesting 
turn of 
> events, yes." Megatron says, as he picks up speed to get a shot at 
Killfest.
>        He see's him throw Aerostreak as if he were a toy...and then 
blast him 
> with two missles. Megatron brought his dino-arm shoulder blasters 
online, and 
> fired at Killfest. "If you want revenge, Killfest, I suggest you 
get it while 
> you can! Yes!"
> 
>        Tankkor drives as the two missle burst behinde him, sending 
him 
> stumbling forward a bit. He turns to see the reinforcements have 
arrived. At 
> least it brings a little relief. He raises his arm back at 
Endbringer, and 
> begins to shoot off plasma blast after plasma blast at him.
> 
>        Akron is sent flying backward from the shot, but quickly 
gets up as 
> the energy from the shot rushes through her body like a jolt of 
energy. "Come 
> on, big boy. Lets get tough!" She says, and, taking out her energon 
riffle, 
> begins to fire off shots at his face.
> 
>        Putnam is hit by Goldeneye, but flies up above her and kicks 
hard. 
> "Give me the vermine! I swear youre going to regreat this...." He 
says, and 
> brandishes a glowing blue fist at the bird.
